name: BotFightPaintball
description:
Free Paintball Third Person Shooter (TPS).

This game is totally free, has no In-App purchases, and no ads. I might add advertisements in the future.

Directions

The goal is to get the fastest time or highest score.

Features
  • Bots: Red, Green, Black, Yellow
  • Weapons: Rifle, Shotgun
  • Cover System
  • Locked Door & Key System
  • Speedrun Timer
  • Maps: Lobby, End, Level 1-2
  • Input: Keyboard & Mouse, Gamepad
Notes

I only packaged for 64-bit but if anyone needs 32-bit please let me know.

Dev

Built with Unreal Engine 4 (UE4).

  • Website: BradAppList
  • YouTube Channel: BradCodeTips
